.. py:module:: ethereum.paris.vm.instructions

EVM Instruction Encoding (Opcodes)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. contents:: Table of Contents
    :backlinks: none
    :local:

Introduction
------------

Machine readable representations of EVM instructions, and a mapping to their
implementations.


.. only:: stage1

   Submodules
   ----------
   .. toctree::
      :titlesonly:
      :maxdepth: 1

      arithmetic/index.rst
      bitwise/index.rst
      block/index.rst
      comparison/index.rst
      control_flow/index.rst
      environment/index.rst
      keccak/index.rst
      log/index.rst
      memory/index.rst
      stack/index.rst
      storage/index.rst
      system/index.rst

----------------

~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~
